moves.name: mega-punch
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: ice-punch
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: thunder-punch
moves.effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: mega-kick
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: tackle
moves.effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: body-slam
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: take-down
moves.effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

moves.name: double-edge
moves.effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
